meanings.definition: Not eligible or suitable for a particular purpose or position.
meanings.sent1: The torn book was ineligibles for the library's collection.
meanings.sent2: The broken toy was ineligibles for the donation.
meanings.sent3: The muddy shoes were ineligibles for the clean carpet.
meanings.sent4: His reckless behavior made him ineligibles for the promotion.
meanings.sent5: The expired coupon was ineligibles for use at the store.

meanings.definition: People who are not eligible for a particular benefit or opportunity.
meanings.sent1: The ineligibles were not allowed to enter the exclusive club.
meanings.sent2: The ineligibles missed out on the scholarship opportunity.
meanings.sent3: The ineligibles joked about starting their own club.
meanings.sent4: She felt like one of the ineligibles in the group of winners.
meanings.sent5: The ineligibles formed a support group for each other.
